title: Tech News: Apple Announces New iPhones and More
itunes:title: Tech News: Apple Announces New iPhones and More
description:
Apple held its Far Out event and unveiled new iPhones, Apple Watches and Airpods. Google is telling employees to cut back on company travel. Microsoft has invested in Travis Kalanick's next company. And Twitter is going to let a subset of users finally edit their tweets.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Apple held its Far Out event and unveiled new iPhones, Apple Watches and Airpods. Google is telling employees to cut back on company travel. Microsoft has invested in Travis Kalanick's next company. And Twitter is going to let a subset of users finally edit their tweets.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:keywords: Apple, iPhone, iOS, iPhone 14, Apple Watch, Airpods, United, air taxi, Google, air travel, Twitter, tweets, China, semiconductors, chip manufacturing, data security, data privacy, Travis Kalanick, CloudKitchen, dark kitchen, Uber
itunes:author: iHeartPodcasts
